segments.advisor_message: So, um, can you tell me the full name of your dependent? Like, just the name?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! It's, uh, Jessica, you know, Smith. But I uh, forgot the last name, wait it’s actually L. Smith, yeah, that’s it.

segments.advisor_message: Great, thanks for that! When was she born? Like, I need the date of birth in DD-MM-YYYY format if possible.
segments.client_message: Oh yeah, it’s, um, 15-04-2010, I think, yes. Uh, really good date for her!

segments.advisor_message: Perfect! And do you, um, know until when she’s considered a dependent? If there’s a certain date.
segments.client_message: Uhh, yeah! It’s, um, going to be until she turns, like, 18. So, I guess that’s 15-04-2028? Let’s go with that! What’s next?
